aka: X-Ray Earth: So tickt die Welt(德)
地球まるみえ！徹底スキャン(日)

director.name: Ian A. Hunt Ian A. Hunt

trans_title: 地球大扫描 第一季
X-Ray Earth: So tickt die Welt(德)
地球まるみえ！徹底スキャン(日)
introduction: Beneath our feet, under trillions of tons of rock, lurk astonishing and deadly secrets. Earthquakes, tsunamis, volcanic eruptions are all driven by hidden forces deep inside our planet. Now, using the latest scientific data from sensors and surface scans, we can x-ray the earth to reveal the dangers locked inside our planet. Using thousands of sensors and state of the art surface scan information, for the first time, we can create x-rays of the deep interior of our planet.S1 E1 - Seattle Mega QuakeS1 E2 - Atlantic Coast KillerS1 E3 - Volcano Apocalypse
chinese_title: 地球大扫描 第一季
